scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test LOGLEVEL=error CHECK_EXPIRES_INTERVAL=5000 EXPIRES_INTERVAL=15000 DRACHTIO_HOST=127.0.0.1 DRACHTIO_PORT=9060 JAMBONES_REDIS_PORT=16379 JAMBONES_NETWORK_CIDR=172.32.0.0/24 node test/
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test LOGLEVEL=error CHECK_EXPIRES_INTERVAL=5000 EXPIRES_INTERVAL=15000 DRACHTIO_PORT=9060 JAMBONES_REDIS_PORT=16379 JAMBONES_NETWORK_CIDR=172.32.0.0/24 ./node_modules/.bin/nyc --reporter html --report-dir ./coverage npm run test
